name: Gust
description: You create a strong wind that batters a target in range. Make a ranged attack, doing 1d6 + MOVE flying damage on a hit.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.

contest.effect: Startles the last Pokemon to act before the user.
